    • Method Detail

      • followAnUser

        @PostMapping("/users/{userId}/follow/{userIdToFollow}")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<org.springframework.http.HttpStatus> followAnUser​(@PathVariable
                                                                                                 int userId,
                                                                                                 @PathVariable
                                                                                                 int userIdToFollow)
                                                                                          throws UserAlreadyFollowedException,
                                                                                                 UserNotFoundException
        This is the US 0001 Endpoint, which enable the option to do a "follow" to an specific user
        Parameters:
        userId - the id of the user who will follow the other user
        userIdToFollow - is the id of the user to be followed
        Returns:
        status OK if all is correct, BAD_REQUEST if not
        Throws:
        UserAlreadyFollowedException - If the user already followed the other user
        UserNotFoundException - If the user hasn't been found

      • getFollowersCount

        @GetMapping("/users/{userId}/followers/count")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<UserDTOFollowersCount> getFollowersCount​(@PathVariable
                                                                                        int userId)
                                                                                 throws UserNotFoundException
        This is the US 0002 Endpoint, which enable the option to get the followers count of an specific seller
        Parameters:
        userId - the id of the seller
        Returns:
        the seller id(as userId), seller name(as userName) and the followers count
        Throws:
        UserNotFoundException - If the user hasn't been found

      • getSortedFollowersList

        @GetMapping("/users/{userId}/followers/list")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<UserDTOFollowersList> getSortedFollowersList​(@PathVariable
                                                                                            int userId,
                                                                                            @RequestParam(required=false)
                                                                                            java.lang.String order)
                                                                                     throws UserNotFoundException,
                                                                                            IncorrectOrderTypeException
        This is the US 0003/0008 Endpoint, which enable the option to get a list of all users who follow a certain seller (Who's following me?)
        Parameters:
        userId - the id of the user who is asked who is following him
        order - Optional parameter which allows the user to choose a sort order
        Returns:
        the user id, the user name and the list of his followers
        Throws:
        UserNotFoundException - If the user hasn't been found
        IncorrectOrderTypeException - If the order parameter is defined with an unknown sort order

      • getSortedFollowedList

        @GetMapping("/users/{userId}/followed/list")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<UserDTOFollowedList> getSortedFollowedList​(@PathVariable
                                                                                          int userId,
                                                                                          @RequestParam(required=false)
                                                                                          java.lang.String order)
                                                                                   throws UserNotFoundException,
                                                                                          IncorrectOrderTypeException
        This is the US 0004/0008 Endpoint, which enable the option to get a list of all users who the user follows (Who am i following?)
        Parameters:
        userId - the id of the user who is asked who is he following?
        order - Optional parameter which allows the user to choose a sort order
        Returns:
        the user id, the user name and the lis of his followed
        Throws:
        UserNotFoundException - If the user hasn't been found
        IncorrectOrderTypeException - If the order parameter is defined with an unknown sort order

      • unfollowAnUser

        @PostMapping("/users/{userId}/unfollow/{userIdToUnfollow}")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<org.springframework.http.HttpStatus> unfollowAnUser​(@PathVariable
                                                                                                   int userId,
                                                                                                   @PathVariable
                                                                                                   int userIdToUnfollow)
                                                                                            throws UserNotFoundException,
                                                                                                   UserAlreadyUnfollowedException
        This is the US 0007 Endpoint, which enable the option to do an "unfollow" to an specific user
        Parameters:
        userId - the id of the user who will unfollow the other user
        userIdToUnfollow - the id of the user to be unfollowed
        Returns:
        an status OK if all is correct, BAD_STATUS if not
        Throws:
        UserNotFoundException - If the user hans't been found
        UserAlreadyUnfollowedException - If the user actually has been unfollowed or the user was never followed
